properties.description: Everyone from the community is welcome for friendship, food and fun. Tea and coffee available. Soup lunch from 12-1.30pm. Oasis Wellbeing Group Tuesday 10.30am-12.30pm CambusBairns parent and toddlers Wednesday 9.15-10.30am Prayer Space available upstairs
properties.title: Cambusbarron Community Hub Warm Space

properties.description: The space is open to all and provides warmth, hot soup and company.
properties.title: The Haven
